What's it Like to Study at Lincoln?
AccommodationDo you want to live on campus? Learn more about our accommodation options.
Virtual campus toursIf you're unable to attend a campus tour in person, but still want to see all our campus has to offer, you can take our virtual tour.
A to Z of Support Services
Timetable supportCreate, read, and manage your timetable. Find out how to check for updates, resolve clashes, and understand activity types and class locations.
Māori and Pasifika ScholarshipsWe offer a number of scholarships for Māori and Pasifika students.The list can be found here.
Research CollaborationsAt Lincoln University we take our research from the lab to the field.
Our sustainability journeyLearn more about our Sustainability Vision and how Lincoln University plans to be an exemplar of sustainable practices for the land-based sector.

Our mission{{ 'Things grow when the conditions are right. At Lincoln, facilitating growth is what we\'re all about.' | except-last-word }}{{ 'Things grow when the conditions are right. At Lincoln, facilitating growth is what we\'re all about.' | last-word }}

Sustainability{{ 'We\'re committed to ensuring that future generations are able to grow and thrive. This means using the world’s resources wisely and sustainably.' | except-last-word }}{{ 'We\'re committed to ensuring that future generations are able to grow and thrive. This means using the world’s resources wisely and sustainably.' | last-word }}

Our campus{{ 'We offer world-leading academic instruction and carry out breakthrough research in a beautiful environment with welcoming, inclusive social spaces.' | except-last-word }}{{ 'We offer world-leading academic instruction and carry out breakthrough research in a beautiful environment with welcoming, inclusive social spaces.' | last-word }}
